data.name: FND Contracting
data.address: 8309 Oak Ct, North Richland Hills, TX 76182

Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"FND is the only company I trust to do a quality job at a fair price." "Great communication and the work was flawless." "Protection of our furniture, floor, & personal items were handled immediately."

Gary and his team were efficient and did an excellent job.  Replaced floors as well as carpet.  His workers are skilled at what they do, the quality of work is definitely higher than what the previous flooring contractor did for me.  They were very respectful and professional as well. Response from the owner a year ago
Thanks David, we are very glad for the work you provided us to do. Also of course the kind words of appreciation. Thanks so much!

We have lived in our home for 23 years and when we 1st moved in it had carpet ( White ) in every room including the bathrooms and toilet area. Yuck.   Anyway we called FND and had hardwood installed in all rooms and stair way  had tile … More

FND contracting did a great job remodeling our kitchen. Gary and his various subcontractors were super about taking care of anything and everything that needed taking care of such as moving a water line and filling in missing tiles and … More Response from the owner a year ago
Thanks Mona, customers like you make out work so much more enjoyable. Thanks for the work, and i hope do additional work for you!
